description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Incidents of travel in Central America, Chiapas, and Yucatan ... Illustrated by numerous engravings ... Twelfth edition.]" Author: STEPHENS, John Lloyd. Contributor: CATHERWOOD, Frederick. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 808.ff.2." Page: 506 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1854 Edition: [Another edition.] Revised from the latest American edition, with additions, by F. Catherwood. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003495401 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
